name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Network Engineer with over 10 years of experience in network infrastructure, specializing in **Cisco**, **Juniper**, and **Palo Alto** technologies. Proven expertise in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** pipelines, coupled with strong capabilities in **Python** for automation and development of **REST-APIs**. Skilled in deploying Infrastructure as Code using **Ansible** and **Terraform**, ensuring efficient network management and operational excellence. Demonstrated history of enhancing system performance and security at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to leveraging skills in **DevOps**, **ITIL**, and networking certifications (CCNA, CCNP, CCIE) to drive successful project outcomes.

Engineered continuous integration and continuous deployment (**CI/CD**) pipelines using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to ensure efficient deployment of applications across multiple environments.
Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, enabling quick provisioning of network resources and achieving a deployment success rate of **99%**.
Implemented robust routing strategies and VLAN configurations to enhance network performance and security, achieving a **15%** improvement in data flow efficiency.
Conducted security assessments leveraging tools from **Cisco**, **Juniper**, and **Palo Alto** to identify vulnerabilities and enhance overall network security posture.
Collaborated cross-functionally to address system integration challenges and ensure compliance with industry standards, leading to a **50%** reduction in integration time.
Designed and managed REST-APIs for seamless communication between network components, enhancing system interoperability and team productivity.
Monitored and optimized network performance using **ITIL** best practices to maintain high availability and reliability of network services.

Designed and maintained network infrastructure utilizing **Cisco** and **Juniper** technologies to ensure optimal performance and reliability for mission-critical applications.
Implemented **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerized application deployment, enhancing scalability and resource management across environments.
Utilized **Python** for scripting and automation of network configurations and monitoring processes, resulting in a **20%** reduction in configuration errors.
Executed **Ansible** playbooks for configuration management, ensuring consistent system settings across **100+** network devices, streamlining deployment processes.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams including development and security to ensure compliance, regulatory needs, and effective fault tolerance across network services.

Conducted thorough network assessments to ensure compliance with ITIL and industry standards while aligning with Cisco and Juniper technologies for best practices.
